sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import Button from './src/components/Button'

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"button"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#button"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Button`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"properties"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#properties"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Properties`}</MDXTag>
<PropsTable of={Button} />
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"basic-usage"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#basic-usage"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Basic usage`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={1} __code={`<Button>Some message</Button>`} __scope={{props,Button}}>
  <Button>Some message</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"using-different-kinds"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#using-different-kinds"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Using different kinds`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={2} __code={`<Button type="secondary" onChange={() => {}}>
  Some message
</Button>`} __scope={{props,Button}}>
  <Button type="secondary" onChange={() => {}}>Some message</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"use-with-children-as-a-function"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#use-with-children-as-a-function"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Use with children as a function`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={3} __code={`{() => {
  const message = \'Hello world\'
  return <Button>{message}</Button>
}}`} __scope={{props,Button}}>
  {() => {
    const message = 'Hello world'
return (
  <Button>{message}</Button>
)
  }}
</Playground></MDXTag>
